name: ai-infra-matrix-e2e
description: E2E tests for AI Infrastructure Matrix

scripts.test:quick: NO_PROXY='*' no_proxy='*' BASE_URL=http://192.168.0.200:8080 playwright test specs/quick-validation-test.spec.js --config=playwright.config.js
scripts.test:full: NO_PROXY='*' no_proxy='*' BASE_URL=http://192.168.0.200:8080 playwright test specs/complete-e2e-test.spec.js --config=playwright.config.js
